mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno} order by rno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set replytext=#{replytext},updatedate=sysdate where rno= #{rno}
mapper.select: select b.rno,b.replytext,b.replyer,b.regdate from (select rownum as rnum,a.rno,a.replytext,a.replyer,a.regdate from (select rno,replytext,replyer,regdate from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno} order by rno desc) a where rownum <= #{cri.end_page}) b where b.rnum >= #{cri.start_page}
